role_description: An Ansible role that installs yank (a terminal output to clipboard tool) on Linux and macOS
role_description_full_overview: [yank](https://github.com/mptre/yank) is a terminal agnostic solution which allows copying output from Termial easily, without the need to use Terminal multiplexers.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs yank (a terminal output to clipboard tool) on Linux and macOS.
